headline: New Relic review
description: New Relic is a powerful monitoring tool which can run synthetic tests and transaction workflows. It has a custom query language to filter metrics. Read our review of New Relic - a website monitoring tool.

offers.description: Limited quota of 100GB data and 10k synthetics checks

negativeNotes: Fewer check locations compared to other tools
positiveNotes: Custom query language for building dashboards

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Website monitoring tool
reviewBody: New Relic is a powerful monitoring tool - in this review we focus on the website monitoring functionality. For synthetic website monitoring, multiple protocols are supported, from HTTP to TCP and WebSockets, and New Relic has powerful alerting functionality and with integrations into many notification platforms like PagerDuty, JIRA and Slack.
